description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Garlic Linguine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Garlic Linguine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add halved cherry tomatoes, baby rocket, crumbled feta and the juice and grated rind of 1 lemon. Season with salt and pepper. Toss well. Divide the pasta between plates and top with prawn mixture. Serve.
